_sText:
Mission Briefing (This text appears in the right of the team choosing menu):
Forge - Bomb/Defuse

Info: A middle age fort has been invaded by unknown individuals with weapons. They made their entrance with explosives. Counter-terrorists have entered the fort as well, in order to prevent any damage events on the monument.

Counter-Terrorists:
Prevent the terrorists from causing any big damage to the fortifications.

Terrorists: Blow up either the haybale stock or the backyard.

Info:
Two bombsites in the map;

Credits:
3nD_Of_The_Lin3

-----"-----

A medium size map. I believe it was a bit based on several maps, for example:
de_inferno;
de_aztec;
de_cbble;
cs_militia;

The purpose of this map is to give you fun times playing Counter-Strike:Source. It gave me a bit of work, so It puts a smile in my face if you post some feedback about it. That will even help me improve my skills, and make a "de_forge2" or any other kind of map each time better and better. Rating will also help me see how much effort I should put next time, and how much I need to improve. Thanks for reading.
Thank you, Valve!
